lxCommand.name: documentclass
lxCommand.desc: Defines the document class (e. g. article)

lxCommand.name: bibliography
lxCommand.desc: Includes one or more bibliography databases

lxEnvironment.name: enumeration
lxEnvironment.desc: Defines an environment for an enumeration

lxEnvironment.name: itemize
lxEnvironment.desc: Defines an environment for an itemization

lxEnvironment.name: description
lxEnvironment.desc: Defines an environment for a description list

lxEnvironment.name: @Book
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for a published book

lxEnvironment.name: @Article
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for an article in a journal or magazine

lxEnvironment.name: @Booklet
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for a book without publisher

lxEnvironment.name: @InBook
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for a book excerpt (e. g. an article within a book)
lxEnvironment.expafter: {(!!Provide a unique key here!!), author = {}, title = {}, year = {}, pages = {}, publisher = {} }

lxEnvironment.name: @Inproceedings
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for an article in a conference transscript
lxEnvironment.expafter: {(!!Provide a unique key here!!), author = {}, title ={}, year = {}, pages = {}, booktitle = {} }

lxEnvironment.name: @Manual
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for a technical documentation
lxEnvironment.expafter: {(!!Provide a unique key here!!), author = {}, title ={}, year = {}, }

lxEnvironment.name: @Misc
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for any other citation

lxEnvironment.name: @PhDThesis
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for a PhD thesis

lxEnvironment.name: @Proceedings
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for an article in a conference transscript
lxEnvironment.expafter: {(!!Provide a unique key here!!), editor = {}, title ={}, year = {}, }

lxEnvironment.name: @TechReport
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for a report of a school or research institute

lxEnvironment.name: @Unpublished
lxEnvironment.desc: BibTeX entry for an unpublished paper
